products.title: Origin (Blackout) Magnolia - Roller Blind
products.description: Pale and neutral, the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings out the best in all colours, and sits on a soft, smooth fabric. As well as being fine and malleable, this blind is a powerful blackout fabric that is durable and will last year upon year. The magnolia will complement almost any shade, and can be used as a central feature in a brown or neutral colour scheme in a bedroom or living room. Or instead, set it amongst greens or blues for a refreshing, calming look in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Spun Pearl - Roller Blind
products.description: The elegant neutrality of the origin (blackout)'s spun pearl brings warmth and sophistication wherever it's used. This taupe coloured blind is made from sturdy, high quality fabric that offers the latest in blackout technology, making it the perfect choice for keeping out harmful uv rays. The spun pearl will add style and grace to a cream and gold dcor scheme in a classic yet contemporary living room or bedroom.

products.title: Deanna Soft Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a gentle, off-white cream to provide a calming, discreet background colour, but want a little bit of character to go with it, then the softly patterned deanna in soft cream is the blind for you. Ideal for a hallway in which you want to control the light without darkening the room or clashing with your existing interior dcor, this blind will work well against browns and other neutrals.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, opaque cream of the origin (blackout) in oyster gives you the best of both worlds; all of the benefits of a high quality blackout blind, while still maintaining a light, window-like feel. The smooth, hardy fabric means it's also built to last, not just for show. Cream, of course, will match almost any colour scheme, but will look particularly good in a traditionally styled neutral living room, surrounded by browns and golds, or pitted against bolder colours in a bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Richmond (Blackout) Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The light hue of the richmond (blackout) in cream belies the effectiveness of its blackout properties, formed from the thick, opaque material from which it is made. The louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light into the room, and when closed, none can filter through. Ensure that your visitors have a great night's sleep by hanging the cream in the guest bedroom. This blind will match a number of style choices, particularly modern, but try teaming it with a tranquil sage green for a relaxing and convivial vibe.

products.title: Lusso Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso in cream has a paper-soft feel, making it a pleasing and appealing blind to touch. Its hue is a beautiful, homely cream, perfect for hanging in a modern family home. Between the discreet stitching and the texture of the fabric, a lightly checked appearance is formed, whilst the blind is all one colour. The cream would make a perfect addition to the kitchen, where its functional look and feel will suit the purpose of the room wonderfully.

products.title: Origin Cream - Day Night Blind
products.description: The ultimate neutral, the origin's cream is light, airy, and versatile in colour, and sleek and shapely in form. The smooth threads are tightly woven to create a sturdy yet lightweight fabric, and the sliding netting is simple and translucent. Meld the cream with peach and coral tones for an unconventional, yet cheerful and pretty, look in the family bathroom. Choose white walls and peach or coral tiling, accessorising with matching towels, wall art, and trinkets.

products.title: Burlington Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: A pretty, yellowy tone, the burlington in cream is a homely blind with a somewhat traditional look and feel. Well-stitched curves adorn this high quality blind, and the sleek louvres offer a contemporary edge to an otherwise classic fabric. Give the cream a home amidst fellow creams, oatmeals, and fawns, where it will sit pretty in this field of neutrals. This light look will give a living room or dining room a feeling of spaciousness and light, and can be easily accented with brushed golds or bronzes.

products.title: Grande Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: On a classic creamy canvas, the grande in cream features a wave-like patterning that adds depth and intrigue to the blind. The adjustable slats provide versatile light entry and easy ventilation, as well as giving any window a sleek and modern aesthetic. Set the cream against a teal feature wall in the living room, where the light colouring will offset the green-blue shade perfectly. Add slate greys throughout the room to add an extra dimension, as well as to tame the brightness of the teal.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark, mature cream, the ajanta (blackout) in cream is a stylish, neutral, and practical blind. White crackle patterning doesn't detract from the gentle shimmer of the fabric, and its easiness to clean and adjustable louvres make this a functional option. For freshness and vitality, with a hint of subtle sophistication, settle the cream in amongst duck egg blue units and country wooden worktops in the kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Spun Pearl - Vertical Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout)'s spun pearl is a strong and vivid shade of grey that will work hard to offset other, brighter colours. The simple, smooth texture of the fabric creates easily movable louvres, which can be adjusted at will to allow as much or as little light in as you like. Use in a chic, contemporary home office with plenty of whites or creams, and the occasional hint of silver every now and again.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Magnolia - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft neutrality of the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings to mind rich dessert cream, and its fine, smooth surface is soft to the touch. As well as being pleasing to the eye, this blind has effective blackout properties, and is made from a high quality, lasting fabric. The magnolia is the perfect neutral, and can be set amongst almost any colour scheme. Use amongst browns in the living room for a traditional look; plums in the dining room for moody cosiness; or blues in the bathroom for freshness and tranquillity.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Don't be fooled by the pale, dainty shade of the palermo (blackout) in cream, as this is a durable, sturdy blind that will last you for years. With adjustable louvres, this blind allows you to control the light easily, and you'll enjoy the way the light bounces off the sheen of the fabric. Versatile by nature, the cream will go with almost any colour scheme you have in mind, making it the perfect choice for rooms such as the bathroom or kitchen, where you can keep the overall shades the same, whilst changing out bold accents as the mood takes you.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Almond - Vertical Blind
products.description: The nutty, creamy oatmeal of the almond, and the subtle style that it emits, belies its highly practical qualities. The roma (fr) range is flame-retardant, making it perfect for either a commercial property or a domestic one, and the louvres are easily adjusted to allow you more or less light or privacy. Feeling bold? Hang the almond against a bold, tropical purple feature wall in the dining room, where it will provide a necessary break to a bold, albeit beautiful, shade.

products.title: Deanna Soft Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pretty, neutral shade of the deanna in soft cream is an easily coordinated colour, fitting in with a wide range of colour schemes around the home. An easy mixture of the traditional and the contemporary, this blind brings class and sophistication wherever it goes. Use amidst dark chocolate and soft mocha browns in your living or dining room, or give a rustic kitchen a classy, modern twist. The soft cream will look especially stylish when coupled with taupe walls and dark woods.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster - Vertical Blind
products.description: The oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost any colour. For a country, shaker-style kitchen, sit the oyster amongst matching cream units, with wooden worktops and rustic furniture, accompanied by pretty florals and vintage-style appliances.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: So subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a mighty blackout blind, ideal for blocking out the outside light. For a neutral look in a home office or bedroom, team the oyster grey with taupes and soft greys, to add calm and serenity to your home.

products.title: Blackout Roller Cream (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Anthology Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology macaroon cream combines an intricate countryside weave with a rich and homely creamy shade that instantly makes you feel at home. It's a subtle infusion of warmth and refinement that is just perfect when you want to add a gentle finish to any room in the house. Think about how you want to create a guest bedroom that will instantly make your visitors feel at home. A few country landscapes on the wall, warm white bulbs in the bedside lamps, and of course a few throws over the end of the bed.

products.title: Cotswold Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

products.title: Cotswold Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.

products.title: Cotswold Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail. For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: Zaragoza enoki oyster takes the traditional silver fabrics you will have seen for years and brings them right up to date in one fell swoop. The way in which it dances with the light serves to accentuate the vitality and energy of the patterning, and adds depth to your decor like never before. Inspiration can be found in the strangest of places, but that doesn't mean you should avoid the obvious sources.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout) Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Our anthology range is the perfect way to integrate the functionality of a blackout blind with the aesthetics of a contemporary style you'll never want to be without again. Macaroon cream has a slightly rich and dusky element to it which we know you're instantly going to fall in love with. Country chic is a great choice to explore further if you want to add this stunning fabric to a completely new style of decor.

products.title: Kalmar Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar ridgeback is a subtly layered design that weaves woody browns and light stone greys together in perfect harmony. By finishing things off with light grey dashes that amplify the natural backdrop of the wooden grain it allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Turn the living room into the relaxing and homely space that you've always wanted by building your new colour scheme out from your windows.

products.title: Kalmar Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: A lighter finish always adds a more contemporary feel to a wood, and the kalmar in spanish cedar brings a classic edge through textured grain and a gentle polish. With high quality parts, and durable basswood, this blind also offers practicality by the bucketload. Finish off a clean and contemporary kitchen, with just a hint of country style, by incorporating the spanish cedar. White units will pair beautifully with wooden worktops, in a similar finish to that of the blind, and a refreshing duck egg blue will offset the look nicely.

products.title: Kalmar Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark wood makes for a classic feature in any room and the kalmar's jacobean oak is a real statement piece. The sturdy, quality basswood, which we source from only sustainable forests, is stained in a traditional dark oak, resulting in a window dressing that offers both style and class. The jacobean oak speaks for itself, so keep its surrounding decor clean and simple, painting the walls in a homely cream and choosing sofas to match.

products.title: Kalmar Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: Painted in light grey, and with a pretty shabby chic effect, the kalmar in pearl river will make a fashionable addition to any home. The quality basswood is responsibly sourced from sustainable forests, so you can be sure you're doing the right thing for the planet - as well as gaining a gorgeous blind for your home. Use the pearl river to craft a vintage theme in your study, opting for a dusky pink feature wall and painting the remaining walls in soft cream or barely-there grey-white.

products.title: Kalmar Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and relax all year round. Transforming the dining room is what barkley does as well as any of their designs. By combining it with a matching set of tableware and a centrepiece you'll be able to dress the room to impress the next time you have your friends and family over to taste your culinary exploits.

products.title: Kalmar Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar cool grey brings a stylish and timeless background colour into your home and blends it beautifully with a gentle off-white that lightens any space. The free-flowing nature of the off-white works in perfect harmony with the cool grey to create a visual that will capture your imagination. Transform the kitchen into the contemporary heart of the home that you have always wanted it to be by coordinating your countertops with cool grey.

products.title: Kalmar Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar iron mountain is one of their most popular contemporary colours, and with good reason. Look closer and you'll see an intricate grain that adds an unexpected layer of depth to this timeless design. Ideal if you want to add something that will take your interiors in a new direction. If you love to celebrate texture as part of your interior design efforts then contrasting iron mountain against a lightly stained wooden floor is one direction you could consider.

products.title: Kalmar Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar windrift is an intriguing mix of classic form and contemporary colouring that is designed to add something different to any home. With a gentle background that serves as the perfect canvas for the white free-flowing grain this is one piece of design that is sure to turn heads. If you're looking to breathe new life into the dining room then windrift could be the breath of fresh air that you've been looking for.

products.title: Linara Spc Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: An effective dim-out blind, the linara smoke restricts light whilst avoiding the total darkness afforded by a blackout. Grey is a colour that never goes out of fashion, perhaps due to its dual functionality as both a useful neutral and a stand-alone feature colour, so this blind will last for years, through a multitude of trends. The striking contemporary greys used in the smoke will be most at home in a modern living room.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout) Smoke Embers - Roller Blind
products.description: As you wonder what to do with your decor you notice something out of the corner of your eye; it's the fabric we call smoke embers from their new verdi (blackout) range. The way in which the light blue shimmers is all down to the intricacy of the stitching, and it's a visual you'll remember for many years to come. If you want to be able to elevate the dining room to the space you love to host your friends and family in it's all about adding refined luxurious touches.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout) Pearl River - Roller Blind
products.description: Verdi (blackout) pearl river is a fabric that seems to flow out of the page and meet you head on. The beauty of it is that it combines a subtle blue background that sits gently where you place it, with an eye-catching pattern that demands to be seen. This is luxury on a whole other level. Taking the dining room and turning it into your own function room that is filled with friends and family night after night is something we all dream of doing.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of the basswood is clearly visible. Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look. Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme. Craft a subtle colour palette of pale greys and soft creams, adding the occasional hint of vintage pink for some characterful hue.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coordinated, so that nothing can detract from this designer aesthetic. Craft a polished country look in the living room by matching the jacobean oak with a burnt orange shade on a feature wall.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detailing - everything from hand-painted slat ends to woven linen taping. Transform a dull hallway into an airy and spacious welcoming by melding the spanish cedar with cream or white walls and opting for country-style woods throughout.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for a new layer of colour that flows gently around any room. We love the idea of use kalmar ridgeback in the conservatory where the increased window space compared to other rooms will allow ridgeback to really set the tone.

products.title: Osborne Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne smoke is a modern reinterpretation of a classically patterned design that takes its inspiration from the beautiful free-flowing forms of natural plant-life. A gentle grey is used to print the design onto the off-white background, giving this version of the osborne a lovely, smoky aesthetic. The smoke works beautifully as a lightener in rooms where darker features dominate, without challenging the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Riviera Stripe Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The riviera stripe smoke is a top quality, lightweight fabric, woven into the most contemporary of modern and eye-catching designs. Giving a full range of grey shades from charcoal, through fashionable stone greys, to a simple and pure off-white, the smoke is sure to be a great addition to your home. The colours on offer in the smoke work well as a way of adding a real depth of colour to a lightly decorated living room or front hallway.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired degree. Invite country sophistication into your home by teaming the oyster with vintage pinks and an accenting sage green in the master bedroom. Include light, naked woods and dreamy florals, dressing the bed linen with plush chenille throws and cushions for an added touch of luxe.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to let in as much or as little light and air as you need. Build a stunningly unusual decor scheme in your home office by setting the smoke grey against a navy blue feature wall. Paint the remaining walls in white or matching pale grey and furnish the room with grey furniture and navy accessories.

products.title: Mayfair Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the contemporary mayfair in ivory within any dcor scheme for a fresh and elegant effect. Supple, fine threads create a nimble and relaxed, cotton-like cloth that works to form an effortless blind with simple style and a sophisticated finish. Blend the ivory with sumptuous linens in alike and gentle shades of silk and biscuit to craft an inviting surrounding, draping the blind in a rich royal blue to both frame the modern hue and introduce a striking burst of contrasting colour.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cream - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).
